title: nf-core/vina pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

receptor.errorMessage: Receptor file must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.pdb'

ligand.errorMessage: Ligand file must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.sdf', '.mol', '.mol2', '.pdb', '.smi', or '.smiles'

center_x.errorMessage: Center X coordinate must be a number

center_y.errorMessage: Center Y coordinate must be a number

center_z.errorMessage: Center Z coordinate must be a number

size_x.errorMessage: Box size X must be a number

size_y.errorMessage: Box size Y must be a number

size_z.errorMessage: Box size Z must be a number
